metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29476 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Requests is a HTTP library written in PHP. Requests mishandlesdeserialization in FilteredIterator. The issue has been patched and usersof `Requests` 1.6.0, 1.6.1 and 1.7.0 should update to version 1.8.0.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
